009package imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.ellipse.geometric;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic.isZero;
012import static imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic.sqr;
013import static imagingbook.common.math.Matrix.makeRealMatrix;
014import static imagingbook.common.math.Matrix.subtract;
015import static java.lang.Math.cos;
016import static java.lang.Math.signum;
017import static java.lang.Math.sin;
018import static java.lang.Math.sqrt;
019import static org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LeastSquaresFactory.evaluationChecker;
020
021import java.util.ArrayList;
022import java.util.List;
023
024import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LeastSquaresFactory;
025import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LeastSquaresOptimizer.Optimum;
026import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LeastSquaresProblem;
027import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LevenbergMarquardtOptimizer;
028import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.MultivariateJacobianFunction;
029import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.Array2DRowRealMatrix;
030import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.ArrayRealVector;
031import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix;
032import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector;
033import org.apache.commons.math3.optim.SimpleVectorValueChecker;
034import org.apache.commons.math3.util.Pair;
035
036import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
037import imagingbook.common.geometry.ellipse.GeometricEllipse;
038import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.ellipse.algebraic.EllipseFitAlgebraic;
039import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.ellipse.algebraic.EllipseFitFitzgibbonStable;
040import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.ellipse.utils.EllipseSampler;
041import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.DialogLabel;
042import imagingbook.common.math.Matrix;
043import imagingbook.common.math.PrintPrecision;
044import imagingbook.common.util.ParameterBundle;

046
047/**
048 * <p>
049 * "Distance-based" geometric ellipse fitter using iterative minimization with
050 * the Levenberg-Marquart method. See Sec. 11.2.2 of [1] for details.
051 * </p>
052 * <p>
053 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An
054 * Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
055 * </p>
056 * 
057 * @author WB
058 * @version 2022/11/17
059 */
060public class EllipseGeometricFitDist extends EllipseFitGeometric {
061        
062        private final Pnt2d[] pts;
063        private final double tolerance;
064        private final int maxEvaluations;
065        private final int maxIterations;
066        
067        private final double[] V;
068        private final double[][] J;
069        
070        private final MultivariateJacobianFunction model;
071        private final Optimum solution;
072        private final List<double[]> history = new ArrayList<>();
073        
074        public EllipseGeometricFitDist(Pnt2d[] pts, GeometricEllipse initEllipse, int maxEvaluations, 
075                        int maxIterations, double tolerance, boolean syntheticDeriv) {
076                this.pts = pts;
077                int n = pts.length;
078                this.V = new double[n];
079                this.J = new double[n][5];
080                this.maxEvaluations = maxEvaluations;
081                this.maxIterations = maxIterations;
082                this.tolerance = tolerance;
083                this.model = (syntheticDeriv) ? new SyntheticModel() : new AnalyticModel();
084                this.solution = solveLM(initEllipse.getParameters());
085        }
086        
087        public EllipseGeometricFitDist(Pnt2d[] pts, GeometricEllipse initEllipse) {
088                this(pts, initEllipse, DefaultMaxIterations, DefaultMaxIterations, DefaultTolerance, false);
089        }
090        
091        // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
092        
093        @Override
094        public double[] getParameters() {
095                return solution.getPoint().toArray();
096        }
097        
098        @Override
099        public int getIterations() {
100                return solution.getIterations();
101        }
102        
103        @Override
104        public List<double[]> getHistory() {
105                return this.history;
106        }
107        
108        // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
109
110        private Optimum solveLM(double[] p0) {
111                LeastSquaresProblem problem = LeastSquaresFactory.create(
112                                this.model,
113                                new ArrayRealVector(pts.length),        // zero vector
114                                new ArrayRealVector(p0),
115                                evaluationChecker(new SimpleVectorValueChecker(tolerance, tolerance)), 
116                                maxEvaluations, maxIterations);
117
118                LevenbergMarquardtOptimizer optimizer = new LevenbergMarquardtOptimizer();
119                Optimum sol = optimizer.optimize(problem);
120                return sol;
121        }
122        
123        // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
124        
125        class AnalyticModel implements MultivariateJacobianFunction {
126        
127                @Override
128                public Pair<RealVector, RealMatrix> value(RealVector point) {
129                        final double[] p = point.toArray();
130                        if (RecordHistory) {
131                                history.add(p.clone());
132                        }
133                        final GeometricEllipse ellipse = new GeometricEllipse(p);
134                        final double ra = ellipse.ra;
135                        final double rb = ellipse.rb;
136                        final double xc = ellipse.xc;
137                        final double yc = ellipse.yc;
138                        final double theta = ellipse.theta;
139                        final double ra2 = sqr(ra);
140                        final double rb2 = sqr(rb);
141                        final double[] xyc = new double[] {xc, yc};
142                        
143                        RealMatrix R = makeRealMatrix(2, 2,
144                                        cos(theta), -sin(theta), 
145                                        sin(theta),  cos(theta));
146                        RealMatrix Rt = R.transpose();
147                        
148                        // calculate values and Jacobian
149                        for (int i = 0; i < pts.length; i++) {
150                                Pnt2d XY = pts[i];
151                                Pnt2d XYp = ellipse.getClosestPoint(XY);
152                                double d = XYp.distance(XY);
153                                V[i] = d;
154                                
155                                double[] xy = XY.toDoubleArray();
156                                double x = xy[0], y = xy[1];
157                                double[] uv = Rt.operate(subtract(xy, xyc));                                    // target point in canon. coordinates
158                                double u = uv[0],  v = uv[1];                                                                   // = (u_i, v_i)
159
160                                double[] xyp = XYp.toDoubleArray();                                                             // ellipse point closest to Xi
161                                double xp = xyp[0], yp = xyp[1];                                                                // = (\breve{x}_i, \breve{y}_i)
162
163                                double[] uvp = Rt.operate(subtract(xyp, xyc));                                  // closest point in canon. coordinates
164                                double up = uvp[0], vp = uvp[1];                                                                // = (\breve{u}_i, \breve{u}_i) 
165                                
166                                double gA = signum((u - up) * up / ra2 + (v - vp) * vp / rb2);
167                                double gB = sqrt(sqr(up / ra2) + sqr(vp / rb2));
168                                if (isZero(gB)) {
169                                        throw new RuntimeException("gB is zero!");
170                                }
171                                double g = gA / gB;
172                                
173                                J[i][0] = -g * sqr(up) / (ra2 * ra);
174                                J[i][1] = -g * sqr(vp) / (rb2 * rb);
175                                if (!isZero(d)) {
176                                        J[i][2] = (xp - x) / d;
177                                        J[i][3] = (yp - y) / d;
178                                        J[i][4] = ((y - yp) * (xc - xp) - (x - xp) * (yc - yp)) / d ;
179                                }
180                                else {
181                                        J[i][2] = J[i][3] = J[i][4] = 0;
182                                }
183                        }
184                        
185                        RealVector VV = new ArrayRealVector(V, false);
186                        RealMatrix JJ = new Array2DRowRealMatrix(J, false);
187                        return new Pair<>(VV, JJ);
188                }
189        }
190        
191        // --------------------------------
192        
193        class SyntheticModel implements MultivariateJacobianFunction {
194                
195                final double delta = 0.00001;
196
197                @Override
198                public Pair<RealVector, RealMatrix> value(RealVector point) {
199                        double[] p = point.toArray();
200                        if (RecordHistory) {
201                                history.add(p.clone());
202                        }
203                        GeometricEllipse ellipse = new GeometricEllipse(p);             // ellipse for current parameter point
204                        GeometricEllipse[] dEllipses = new GeometricEllipse[5]; // differentially modified ellipses
205                        for (int j = 0; j < 5; j++) {
206                                double[] pd = p.clone();
207                                pd[j] = p[j] + delta;
208                                dEllipses[j] = new GeometricEllipse(pd);
209                        }
210                        
211                        // calculate values and Jacobian
212                        for (int i = 0; i < pts.length; i++) {
213                                Pnt2d XYi = pts[i];
214                                Pnt2d XYp = ellipse.getClosestPoint(XYi);
215                                double di = XYp.distance(XYi);
216                                V[i] = di;                                                              // value = distance of point to ellipse
217                                
218                                for (int j = 0; j < 5; j++) {
219                                        Pnt2d XYpj = dEllipses[j].getClosestPoint(XYi);
220                                        J[i][j] = (XYpj.distance(XYi) - di) / delta;    // estimated partial derivative
221                                }
222                        }
223                        
224                        RealVector VV = new ArrayRealVector(V, false);
225                        RealMatrix JJ = new Array2DRowRealMatrix(J, false);
226                        return new Pair<>(VV, JJ);
227                }
228        }
229    
230    // -------------------------------------------------------------------

277        
278        // -------------------------------------------------------------------
279        // -------------------------------------------------------------------
280        
281        public static class Parameters implements ParameterBundle<EllipseGeometricFitDist> {
282                
283                @DialogLabel("number of points")
284                public int n = 20;
285                
286                @DialogLabel("ellipse center (xc)")
287                public double xc = 200;
288                
289                @DialogLabel("ellipsecenter (yc)")
290                public double yc = 190;
291                
292                @DialogLabel("major axis radius (ra)")
293                public double ra = 170;
294                
295                @DialogLabel("minor axis radius (rb)")
296                public double rb = 120;
297                
298                @DialogLabel("start angle (deg)")
299                public double angle0 = 0;
300                
301                @DialogLabel("stop angle (deg)")
302                public double angle1 = 180; // was Math.PI/4;
303                
304                @DialogLabel("ellipse orientation (deg)")
305                public double theta = 45;
306                
307                @DialogLabel("x/y noise (sigma)")
308                public double sigma = 5.0; //2.0;
309        };
310        
311        private static Parameters params = new Parameters();
312        
313      
314    public static void main(String[] args) {
315        
316        System.out.println("*** Testing "  + EllipseGeometricFitDist.class.getSimpleName() + " ***");
317        PrintPrecision.set(9);
318        
319        GeometricEllipse realEllipse = new GeometricEllipse(params.ra, params.rb, params.xc, params.yc, 
320                                Math.toRadians(params.theta));
321        
322        EllipseSampler sampler = new EllipseSampler(realEllipse, 17);
323        
324        Pnt2d[] points = sampler.getPoints(params.n, 
325                                Math.toRadians(params.angle0), Math.toRadians(params.angle1), params.sigma);
326        
327//      Pnt2d[] points = null;
328        //Pnt2d[] points = CircleMaker.makeTestCircle(XC, YC, R, 100, Angle0, Angle1, SigmaNoise);
329        //Pnt2d[] points = CircleMaker.makeTestCircle(XC, YC, R, 4, Angle0, Angle1, 0.1);
330        //Pnt2d[] points = CircleSampler.makeTestGander(30);
331        //Pnt2d[] points = CircleSampler.make3Points(30);
332                
333        EllipseFitAlgebraic fitA = new EllipseFitFitzgibbonStable(points);
334        
335        GeometricEllipse ellipseA = new GeometricEllipse(fitA.getEllipse());
336        System.out.println("ellipseA = " + ellipseA);
337        System.out.println("errorA = " + ellipseA.getMeanSquareError(points));
338                
339        EllipseGeometricFitDist fitG = new EllipseGeometricFitDist(points, ellipseA);
340        GeometricEllipse ellipseG = fitG.getEllipse();
341        System.out.println("ellipseG = " + ellipseG);
342        System.out.println("errorG = " + ellipseG.getMeanSquareError(points));
343        System.out.println("iterations = " + fitG.getIterations());
344        
345        for (double[] p : fitG.getHistory()) {
346                System.out.println("   " + Matrix.toString(p));
347        }
348        
349        // check analytic/synthetic Jacobians:
350        GeometricEllipse eTest = new GeometricEllipse (100, 120, 50, -30, 0.25);
351        Pnt2d xi = Pnt2d.from(110, -70);
352        Pnt2d[] pts = {xi};
353        
354        {
355                EllipseGeometricFitDist fit = new EllipseGeometricFitDist(pts, ellipseA);
356                MultivariateJacobianFunction model = fit.new AnalyticModel();
357                Pair<RealVector, RealMatrix> result = model.value(Matrix.makeRealVector(eTest.getParameters()));
358                RealMatrix J = result.getSecond();
359                System.out.println("J analytic = \n" + Matrix.toString(J.getData()));
360        }
361        
362        {
363                EllipseGeometricFitDist fit = new EllipseGeometricFitDist(pts, ellipseA);
364                MultivariateJacobianFunction model = fit.new SyntheticModel();
365                Pair<RealVector, RealMatrix> result = model.value(Matrix.makeRealVector(eTest.getParameters()));
366                RealMatrix J = result.getSecond();
367                System.out.println("J synthetic = \n" + Matrix.toString(J.getData()));
368        }
369    }
370
